name: olimp
description: Olimp is an online store site selling sports equipment and goods focused on healthy leisure. This site is developed with 'JavaScript' and a third party range slider 'noUiSlider' using the number formatting library 'wNumb' to select a value from a specific range, also the site uses a touch slider 'Swiper' to scroll through the content on the page
author: NightMareStories
